note.p: Lace manufacturer. Son of Sarah and Michael Browne, solicitor, of Nottingham, and brother of Hugh Browne.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2129/28/8), 1881 (RG11/3345/97/65)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 28 November 2019)
